mapper.insert: insert into spring_blog_comments (comment_no, comment_writer, comment_content, blog_no) values (spring_comment_seq.nextval, #{writer.id},#{content},#{blog.no})
mapper.select: select a.comment_no as no, a.comment_writer as "writer.id", b.user_name as "writer.name", a.comment_content as content, a.blog_no as "blog.no", a.comment_created_date as createdDate from spring_blog_comments a, spring_users b where a.comment_writer = b.user_id and a.blog_no = #{value} order by a.comment_no asc
